input.sentences: we gathered for [male] 's surprise party at the restaurant .
we got the signal that he was in the parking lot .
we lit all the candles and got the cameras ready .
[male] 's face will tell you how he feels about surprises .
eventually he came around and joined in the fun . everyone had a great time .
output.sentences: Everyone is hamming it up and having a good time.
All hands on deck for this candle lighting, the birthday boy is a special guy.
Lighting the cake together is a tradition that definitely will not die with these happy birthday goers.

The birthday boy looks like he just ate a smurf, but he's enjoying the attention!
